entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
